text: Oxidae is a family of prostigs in the order Trombidiformes. There are at least 4 genera and about 15 described species in Oxidae. ==Genera== * Flabellifrontipoda * Frontipoda Koenike, 1891 * Gnaphiscus Koenike, 1898 * Oxus Kramer, 1877 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Oxidae
